alert.note: Alert for Perkins (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 05 at 7:14AM MDT until July 05 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...THE SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING FOR NORTHEASTERN PERKINS COUNTY IS CANCELLED... The storm which prompted the warning has moved out of the area. Therefore, the warning has been cancelled. However small hail, gusty winds and heavy rain are still possible with this thunderstorm. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM MDT for northwestern South Dakota. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service Rapid City. Remember, a Severe Thunderstorm Warning still remains in effect for central Perkins County until 800 AM MDT.
